articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Video game Green Hell is being turned into a board game - Polygon
articles.description: Green Hell, the hit survival game on Steam and Nintendo Switch, is being turned into a board game. Galaktus Games is a new studio founded in 2020, and is so far unproven in the tabletop space. A Kickstarter is expected soon.
articles.content: The unproven studio is launching a Kickstarter soon

articles.title: The Apple Watch Series 6 has dropped to $299 for the first time - The Verge
articles.description: Walmart, Amazon, and Best Buy have reduced the price of the 40mm Apple Watch Series 6 in red down to $299. It normally sold for $399. Other deals include $80 off a Google Nest Wifi bundle and discounted NES controllers.
